Name: Lynchburg Lemonade
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel.
POUR all ingredients into chilled glass.
Review: Tangy, light and very easy to drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe created for the Jack Daniel's distillery in - yep, you guessed it - Lynchburg, Tennessee.
Nutrition: One serving of Lynchburg Lemonade contains 149 calories
